name: the backrooms alternative
description:
if you're not careful and no-clip out of reality in the wrong areas, you will end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent light at max hum-buzz, and approximately six-hundred million square of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in... 

yes, this is an another backrooms game, but this time it is cheaply made. featuring a player character who is a cat that only speak cat language, but are willing to communicate in human too. unfortunately, for this kitty, they no clipped to the backrooms. 

maintain sanity, pick up almond water, and avoid entities in this simple random generation of the backrooms recreation. featuring the first level0 and four cannon levels + alternative OC levels called "sector".  

experience the pure feelings of getting lost in the backrooms, hopelessly no-clipping to get to anywhere possible.
